about_the_game:
Upgrade to the Deluxe Edition and receive the following content:
  • 3 exclusive scenarios across all landscape types to challenge your skills
  • 6 new and exclusive historical vehicles to play with:
    • Hong Kong Meridian Ferry
    • McDonnell Douglas DC-10-30
    • British High Speed Train HST ”Inter-City 125”
    • Kenworth K100E
    • Citroën U55 Currus Cityrama
    • Toyama Chihou Railway 8000 Series Tram
  • 3 surprising new animals for the three landscape types: wolf, puma and tropical fishes
  • 2 new in-game soundtracks from the two prequels Train Fever and Transport Fever
detailed_description:
Upgrade to the Deluxe Edition and receive the following content:
  • 3 exclusive scenarios across all landscape types to challenge your skills
  • 6 new and exclusive historical vehicles to play with:
    • Hong Kong Meridian Ferry
    • McDonnell Douglas DC-10-30
    • British High Speed Train HST ”Inter-City 125”
    • Kenworth K100E
    • Citroën U55 Currus Cityrama
    • Toyama Chihou Railway 8000 Series Tram
  • 3 surprising new animals for the three landscape types: wolf, puma and tropical fishes
  • 2 new in-game soundtracks from the two prequels Train Fever and Transport Fever

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 or higher (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i5-2300 or AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560 or AMD Radeon HD 7850, 2 GB VRAM
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 or higher (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i7-4770k or AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 580, 4 GB VRAM

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.14 or higher (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i5 quad-core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 M290, 2 GB VRAM
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X 10.14 or higher (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i7 quad-core
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon Pro 580, 4 GB VRAM

short_description: Upgrade to the Deluxe Edition and receive the following content: 3 exclusive scenarios across all landscape types to challenge your skills, 6 new and exclusive historical vehicles to play with, 3 surprising new animals for the three landscape types: wolf, puma and tropical fishes
supported_languages:
English*, French, German*, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Dutch, Polish, Russian, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Italian, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support
